identity.description: Managed service identity (either system assigned, or none)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The resource name of the Test Base Account.

properties.description: The properties of a Test Base Account resource.

name.description: The resource name of the Test Base Customer event.

properties.description: A notification events subscribed to be received by customer.

name.description: The resource name of the test base custom image.

properties.description: The properties of the test base custom image.

properties.description: The properties of the Test Base Draft Package.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The resource name of the Test Base Package.

properties.description: The properties of the Test Base Package.

name.description: The resource name of a favorite process in a package. If the process name contains characters that are not allowed in Azure Resource Name, we use 'actualProcessName' in request body to submit the name.

properties.description: Properties of a favorite process identifier.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

alwaysRun.description: Specifies whether to run the command even if a previous command is failed.

applyUpdateBefore.description: Specifies whether to apply update before the command.

content.description: The content of the command. The content depends on source type.

enrollIntuneBefore.description: Specifies whether to enroll Intune before the command.

install1PAppBefore.description: Specifies whether to install first party applications before running the command.

maxRunTime.description: Specifies the max run time of the command.

postUpgrade.description: Specifies whether the command is assigned to be executed after in-place upgrade.

preUpgrade.description: Specifies whether the command is assigned to be executed before in-place upgrade.

restartAfter.description: Specifies whether to restart the VM after the command executed.

runAsInteractive.description: Specifies whether to run the command in interactive mode.

runElevated.description: Specifies whether to run the command as administrator.

Command.description: The command used in the test

CredentialProperties.description: The properties of test base credential

eventName.description: The name of the event subscribed to.

CustomerEventProperties.description: A notification events subscribed to be received by customer.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

vhdId.description: The Id of the associated VHD resource.

CustomImageProperties.description: The properties of the test base custom image.

intuneApp.description: The Metadata of a single Intune App.

intuneAppDependencies.description: The Metadata of dependencies of the Intune App through intunewin file uploading.

DraftPackageIntuneAppMetadata.description: The metadata of Intune app(s) used for generation.

expectedExitCodes.description: Expected exit codes returned from Intune App.

minimumSupportedOS.description: Minimum supported OS. The OS version must be greater than this version to run this app.

DraftPackageIntuneAppMetadataItem.description: The Metadata of a single Intune App.

appFileName.description: The name of the app file.

editPackage.description: Specifies whether this draft package is used to edit a package.

executableLaunchCommand.description: The executable launch command for script auto-fill. Will be used to run the application.

firstPartyApps.description: The list of first party applications to test along with user application.

flightingRing.description: The flighting ring for feature update.

galleryApps.description: The list of gallery apps to test along with user application.

highlightedFiles.description: The highlight files in the package.

inplaceUpgradeOSPair.description: Specifies the baseline os and target os for in-place upgrade tests.

intuneMetadata.description: The metadata of Intune app(s) used for generation.

packageId.description: Specifies the package id from which the draft package copied.

processName.description: The process name for script auto-fill. Will be used to identify the application process.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

targetOSList.description: Specifies the target OSs of specific OS Update types.

testTypes.description: OOB, functional or flow driven. Mapped to the data in 'tests' property.

useAutofill.description: Indicates whether user choose to enable script auto-fill.

useSample.description: Specifies whether a sample package should be used instead of the one uploaded by the user.

DraftPackageProperties.description: The properties of the Test Base Draft Package.

EnrolledIntuneApp.description: Metadata of the enrolled Intune app.

actualProcessName.description: The actual name of the favorite process. It will be equal to resource name except for the scenario that the process name contains characters that are not allowed in the resource name.

FavoriteProcessProperties.description: Properties of a favorite process identifier.

architecture.description: The architecture of a first party application of a Test Base Account.

channel.description: The channel info of a first party application of a Test Base Account.

interopExecutionMode.description: Specifies how the first party applications should be inter-operated with user's application.

name.description: The media name of a first party application of a Test Base Account.

ring.description: The ring info of a first party application of a Test Base Account.

FirstPartyAppDefinition.description: Properties of the definition of a first party application of the Test Base package.

isConsented.description: Whether the disclaimer of the gallery application is accepted.

skuId.description: The SKU id of the gallery application.

GalleryAppDefinition.description: Properties of the definition of a gallery application used in Test Base package.

path.description: The path of the highlighted file.

sections.description: The name of sections to highlight.

visited.description: A flag to save whether this file is viewed by user.

HighlightedFile.description: The information of a highlighted file that user should pay attention to.

ImageDefinitionProperties.description: The image properties under the image definition name.

baselineOS.description: The properties of an operating system.

targetOS.description: Specifies the target os for in-place upgrade tests.

InplaceUpgradeOSInfo.description: Specifies the baseline os and target os for in-place upgrade tests.

credentialId.description: The id of the Intune enrollment credential.

expectedDeploymentDurationInMinute.description: The expected duration of Intune applications and policies deployment.

passwordKeyVaultSecretPath.description: The key vault secret path of password.

userNameKeyVaultSecretPath.description: The key vault secret path of user name.

receiverType.description: The type of the notification event receiver.

customImageId.description: Specify the referenced Test Base Custom Image Id if available.

releaseProperties.description: The properties of an operating system release.

OsProperties.description: The properties of an operating system.

blobPath.description: The file path of the package.

draftPackageId.description: The id of draft package. Used to create or update this package from a draft package.

firstPartyApps.description: The list of first party applications to test along with user application.

flightingRing.description: The flighting ring for feature update.

inplaceUpgradeOSPair.description: Specifies the baseline os and target os for in-place upgrade tests.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

targetOSList.description: Specifies the target OSs of specific OS Update types.

PackageProperties.description: The properties of the Test Base Package.

buildNumber.description: The build number of the OS release.

buildRevision.description: The build revision of the OS release.

releaseName.description: The name of the OS release.

releaseVersionDate.description: The release version date of the OS release.

ReleaseProperties.description: The properties of an operating system release.

role.description: The role of the notification receiver.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id of the notification receiver.

subscriptionName.description: The subscription name of the notification receiver.

SystemAssignedServiceIdentity.description: Managed service identity (either system assigned, or none)

baselineOSs.description: Specifies the baseline OSs to be tested.

insiderChannelIds.description: Insider Channel Ids. Only used for feature update.

osUpdateType.description: Specifies the OS update type to test against, e.g., 'Security updates' or 'Feature updates'.

targetOSImageIds.description: Specifies the ids of the target OSs from Custom Images to be tested.

targetOSs.description: Specifies the target OSs to be tested.

TargetOSInfo.description: The information of the target OS to be tested.

commands.description: The commands used in the test.

isActive.description: Indicates if this test is active.It doesn't schedule test for not active Test.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

sku.description: Describes a Test Base Account SKU.

TestBaseAccountResourceProperties.description: The properties of a Test Base Account resource.

locations.description: The locations that the SKU is available.

name.description: The name of the SKU. This is typically a letter + number code, such as B0 or S0.

resourceType.description: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

tier.description: The tier of this particular SKU.

TestBaseAccountSKU.description: Describes a Test Base Account SKU.
